Headline: #54 Cicero Temporary Northbound Reroute near Cicero/Deming
ShortDescription: NB 54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Fullerton, Laramie, Diversey & Cicero, due to police activity near Cicero/Deming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #54 Cicero buses are temporarily rerouted via Cicero, Fullerton, Laramie, Diversey, then resume their normal route on Cicero, due to police activity near Cicero/Deming.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express & #15 Jeffery Local Temporary Reroute at 67th/Ridgeland
ShortDescription: 6 Jackson Park Exp & 15 Jeffery Local buses are temp rerouted via Stony Island, Marquette, Jeffery & 67th, due to due to police activity near 67th/Ridgeland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#6 Jackson Park Exp & #15 Jeffery Local buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Stony Island, Marquette, Jeffery & 67th, due to due to police activity near 67th/Ridgeland.

Allow extra travel time.
